com.cmput301w21t36.phenocount

Class Post

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cmput301w21t36.phenocount.Post
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Reply

    public abstract class Post
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Role: model This Post abstract class can be specialized as class Question, and class Reply; it contains basic information for a post in the discussion forum.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
